title: Garamond, I think... and...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016233116im_/http:/typophile.com/files/two_fonts_4100.jpg)

Please identify these two typefaces, please!

Thank you! You are a saint!

Jaz
author: halloran

comments.content:
Jaz,

For the sans, I would say [Avenir 85 Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016233116/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/avenir_std_85_heavy/?sample_text=CLASS%20IDEALIZATION)

I think it's Sabon, Tschichold's son of Garamond. (Compare the u/c R)

[Sabon bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016233116/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/sabon_std_bold/?sample_text=KRISSY%20BISHOP) for KRISSY BISHOP, and [Sabon regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016233116/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/sabon_std_roman/) for the text.

Vivicity,

thank you very much!

Take care,

Jaz
